titles.title: A bill to provide additional funding under the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act.
Family Strengthening Infrastructure Act of 2021
Family Strengthening Infrastructure Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Family Strengthening Infrastructure Act of 2021
This bill provides additional funding through FY2031 for state and community-based child abuse prevention and treatment programs.
